name: Acquired Ventrue Assets
effect: Master. Put an amount of blood counters (from the blood bank) on this card equal to the number of Giovanni you control. During your master phase, you may move 1 blood from this card to any Giovanni you control. Burn this card if there is no blood on it. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Ventrue as a (D) action.

name: Aire of Elation
effect: You cannot play another action modifier to further increase the bleed for this action. [pre] +1 bleed; +2 bleed if acting vampire is Toreador. [PRE] +2 bleed; +3 bleed if acting vampire is Toreador.

name: Alexandra
effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) Once during your turn, you may tap or untap another ready Toreador. +2 bleed.

name: Amadeo
effect: Camarilla Primogen: If Amadeo successfully hunts, he gains 1 additional blood.

name: Anathema
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Prince or Justicar at +1 stealth. Choose a ready vampire. If the referendum is successful, put this card on that vampire. If that vampire is reduced to zero blood in combat, he or she is burned, and the Methuselah controlling the opposing minion gains pool equal to the burned vampire's capacity.

name: Andrei Puxon
effect: Independent

name: Antediluvian Awakening
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Each Methuselah burns 1 pool during each of his or her untap phases. Any Methuselah can burn this card during his or her untap phase by voluntarily burning one vampire with a capacity above 3 that he or she controls.

name: Antoinette DuChamp
effect: Camarilla: If Antoinette uses an action or strike that requires Celerity, she burns an additional blood.

name: Apparition
effect: Do not replace until after combat. [chi] Prevent up to 1 damage to this vampire each round of combat. [CHI] As above, but prevent up to 2 damage.

name: Arika
effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) If Arika is ready during your prey's untap phase, your prey chooses which locations he or she keeps in play. For each location he or she controls, your prey burns one pool or burns the location. +2 bleed.
attributes: • Disciplines: aus cel DOM FOR OBF PRE

name: Artistically Inept
effect: Master. Put this card on any ready Brujah. Toreador cannot attempt to block the actions of that vampire. This card may be burned by any Toreador as a (D) action.

name: Banishment
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any vampire at +1 stealth. Choose a younger ready vampire. Successful referendum means that the chosen vampire is moved to the uncontrolled region (place him or her face down). The vampire is uncontrolled. The vampire's blood counters, master cards and minion cards stay with that vampire, with any counters they have on them (minion cards are out of play as long as the vampire remains uncontrolled).

name: Blessing of Durga Syn
effect: [chi] Strike: steal equipment. [CHI] Strike: steal equipment with First Strike.

name: Blythe Candeleria
effect: Camarilla: Blythe gets -1 strength when in combat with a Malkavian.

name: Brujah Debate
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Each Methuselah with a ready Brujah must tap one of the highest capacity Brujah he or she controls during his or her master phase. Each Brujah gets +1 strength and an optional maneuver each combat. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Ventrue as a (D) action.

name: Bureaucratic Overload
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Any vampire attempting a political action burns 1 additional blood. This card may be burned by a referendum. Calling the referendum is a +1 stealth political action.

name: Burning Wrath
effect: [pot] Strike: strength+1 damage, aggravated. [POT] Strike: strength+2 damage, aggravated.

name: Carlotta Giovanni
effect: Independent: Carlotta may exchange a library card in your ash heap for a card in your hand as a +1 stealth action that costs 1 blood.

name: Chandler Hungerford
effect: Camarilla: Chandler gets +1 intercept when attempting to block other Gangrel.

name: Chimerstry
effect: Master: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire has Chimerstry; if the vampire already had Chimerstry, he or she now has superior Chimerstry. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be played on a vampire with superior Chimerstry.

name: Clan Loyalty
effect: Only usable when this vampire is successfully blocked by a vampire of the same clan (play before combat). Cancel the block and combat. The action continues as normal, and no vampires of that clan may block the acting vampire for the remainder of the turn.

name: Closed Session
effect: Requires ready Prince, Justicar, or Inner Circle member. Only usable during a referendum, before any votes are cast. Non-Camarilla vampires cannot vote on the current referendum.

name: Command of the Harpies
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Camarilla vampire at +1 stealth. Choose a ready Prince. Put this card on that vampire. Successful referendum means the Prince loses his or her title.

name: Compel the Spirit
effect: +1 stealth action. Only usable if a retainer or ally you control has been burned since your last turn. [nec] Move the card from your ash heap to your hand. [NEC] Move the card from your ash heap to your ready region, even if this vampire doesn't meet the requirements, if any, of the card (use the normal version if it requires a Discipline). Move X life counters from the blood bank to the card, where X is the number of life printed on the card. If a retainer is chosen, it must be placed on the acting minion.

name: Conflict of Interests
effect: Only usable during a referendum. Cancel the votes of a vampire who belongs to the same clan as this reacting minion.

name: Constanza Vinti
effect: Camarilla Prince of Rome: Constanza gets +2 bleed -when bleeding a Methuselah who controls a ready Ventrue-.

name: Corpse Minion
effect: Ghoul with 1 life. Vampire with this retainer may burn X blood to get +X intercept for the current action.

name: Cristofero Giovanni
effect: Independent

name: Daliyah
effect: Camarilla

name: Darius Styx
effect: Independent: Darius may look at one random card from another Methuselah's hand as a (D) action. If it is an equipment or retainer card, place it on Darius at no cost (using the normal version, if it requires a Discipline).

name: Dartmoor, England
effect: This equipment card represents a unique location and does not count as equipment while in play. The vampire with this location gets +1 stealth on any action requiring Animalism or Protean.

name: Destructive Secrets
effect: +1 stealth action. (D) Choose any minion; if this action is successful, that minion cannot block Nosferatu until the end of the turn.

name: Donal O'Connor
effect: Camarilla Prince of Dublin: Any vampire blocking Donal burns 1 blood before combat begins.

name: Elysium: The Palace of Versailles
effect: Master: unique location. Only usable during a political action. Tap to give 1 extra vote to each Inner Circle member, Justicar, Prince, and Primogen you control.

name: Enzo Giovanni, Pentex Board of Directors
effect: Independent: Enzo may attempt to block any political action attempted by any Methuselah; he gets +1 intercept against any political action not attempted by a Prince, Justicar, or Inner Circle member.

name: Etrius
effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) Etrius may steal up to 3 blood from another Tremere as a +1 stealth (D) action. +2 bleed.

name: Eyes of the Dead
effect: Only usable when a reacting vampire you control attempts to block a vampire who is attempting to diablerize one of your vampires. [nec] This reacting vampire gets +1 intercept. [NEC] As above, but with +2 intercept.

name: Faithful Servant
effect: Mortal with 1 life. If the vampire with this retainer is in torpor, he or she gains 1 blood at the beginning of his or her minion phase.

name: Far Fatuus
effect: [chi] Strike: 2R damage; only usable at long range. [CHI] As above, and prevent all damage from opponent's strikes for the remainder of this round.

name: Fata Morgana
effect: [chi] +1 stealth. [CHI] You cannot play another action modifier to further increase the bleed for this action. +1 bleed, or +1 bleed and +1 stealth.

name: Fear of Mekhet
effect: Master. Put this card on a ready Justicar or Inner Circle member. Tap that vampire. During his or her untap phase, that vampire burns 5 blood. If he or she cannot burn the blood, burn this card and burn that vampire; otherwise, the card is placed on another IC member of that vampire's controler's choice; if there are no other ready IC members, burn this card.

name: Force of Will
effect: Only usable by a tapped vampire. [for] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. This vampire takes 2 points of aggravated damage (damage not preventable) even if the action is blocked. Damage occurs after the action or combat is resolved. [FOR] As above, but with +2 bleed, and the acting vampire takes only 1 point of aggravated damage (damage not preventable).

name: Forest of Shadows
effect: Master: unique location. Tap this card to give a Malkavian you control +X stealth until the end of turn, where X is the amount of blood the Malkavian burns. You may only increase your stealth to 1 greater than your opponent's current intercept. This location may be burned by any minion as a (D) action.

name: Fortune Teller
effect: Mortal with 1 life. During your minion phase, you may look at one card picked at random from your prey's hand.

name: Fortune Teller Shop
effect: Master: unique location. Tap to give any Ravnos +1 stealth.

name: Francesca Giovanni
effect: Independent

name: Franciscus
effect: Camarilla: Franciscus is burned (without going into torpor) if he takes more than 3 damage during combat.

effect: Camarilla Prince of Paris: Francois may steal up to 2 blood from a younger vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action. +1 bleed.

effect: Master. Put this card in play. Each Gangrel you control gets +1 strength. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Ravnos as a (D) action.

name: Gaspare Giovanni
effect: Independent: During your master phase, Gaspare may burn 2 blood to move a vampire from your ash heap to the top of your crypt. +1 strength.

name: Giovanni Acceptance
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any vampire at +1 stealth. If this referendum is successful, all Giovanni change their staus from Independent vampires to Camarilla vampires for the rest of the game. All options available to Camarilla clans are now open to the Giovanni.

name: Giovanni Discrimination
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Any Giovanni burns 1 additional blood when attempting to block an action. This card may be burned by any minion as a (D) action.

name: Giuseppe, Gravedigger
effect: Unique mortal with 1 life. The Vampire with this retainer gets +1 stealth on any action that requires Necromancy. Alternate card name: Guiseppe, Gravedigger

name: Gloria Giovanni
effect: Independent

effect: Master. Only usable if you have at least one untapped Ravnos in play. Tap one of your Ravnos. Move the next vampire in the crypt of any Methuselah to that Methuselah's ash heap. If the vampire you place in the ash heap is a Prince, gain 2 pool.

effect: Camarilla Prince of Stockholm

effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) +2 bleed

name: Heidelberg Castle, Germany
effect: Master: unique location. Tap to transfer equipment cards, move blood and transfer retainers between any two ready vampires you control. (You may choose the amount of blood you move and which cards you transfer.) Cannot be used during an action. Alternate card name: Heidelburg Castle, Germany

name: Horrid Reality
effect: Only usable before range is determined in combat. [chi] Equip this minion with the first weapon you find in your library (working down from the top). Do not pay the cost for this weapon. Shuffle afterward. At the end of the combat, burn the weapon if it is still in play. [CHI] As above, but return the equipment to your library at the end of combat if it is still in play. Shuffle afterward.

name: Horrific Countenance
effect: Only usable when this vampire is blocked. Untap the blocking minion. This action is not blocked, and it is now unblockable.

name: Ignis Fatuus
effect: [chi] The acting minion gets -1 stealth for the remainder of the turn. [CHI] Reduce a bleed against any Methuselah by 1.

name: Inbase Discotek, Frankfurt
effect: Master: unique location. Tap to give a vampire who successfully hunts an additional blood from the blood bank. (Ignore excess blood.)

name: Incriminating Videotape
effect: Equipment. Choose a minion your prey controls. For the rest of the game, the chosen minion cannot block the minion with this equipment.

name: Ingrid Rossler
effect: Camarilla Prince of Geneva: If Ingrid is ready, you get two extra transfers during your influence phase.

name: Inveraray, Scotland
effect: This equipment card represents a unique location and does not count as equipment while in play. The vampire with this location may move 1 blood to this card as an action; no more than 3 blood may be put on this card. The vampire gets +X bleed, where X is the amount of blood on the card.

name: Jar the Soul
effect: +1 stealth action. [nec] (D) Tap any ready minion. [NEC] (D) As above, and that minion burns 1 blood.

effect: Camarilla Prince of Barcelona: Javier burns 1 less blood when rescuing a vampire in torpor. +1 bleed.

name: Joaquina Amaya
effect: Independent: Joaquina gets an additional +1 stealth when equipping.

name: Judgment: Camarilla Segregation
effect: Requires ready Prince or Justicar. +1 stealth action. Put this card in play. Each Methuselah controlling a Non-Camarilla vampire burns 1 pool during his or her untap phase. Any Methuselah may burn this card by burning a Non-Camarilla vampire he or she controls during his or her minion phase.

name: Judgment: Death to the Brujah!
effect:
Requires ready prince or justicar. +1 stealth action.
Put this card in play. Any vampire may take a (D) action to enter combat with any Brujah controlled by another Methuselah. Any Methuselah may burn this card by burning a Brujah he or she controls during his or her minion phase. Only one Death to the Brujah! card may be played during a game.

name: Katarina
effect: Camarilla Prince of Glasgow: Katarina gets +1 bleed -when bleeding a Methuselah who controls a ready Ravnos-.

name: Kindred Coercion
effect: Only usable during a referendum. [dom] Cancel the votes of X vampires. The affected vampires cannot be older than this reacting vampire. [DOM] As above, but change the votes of the affected vampires to votes of your choice.

name: Klaus van der Veken
effect: Camarilla Prince of Amsterdam: Klaus may cancel the effects of one of your prey's hunting ground cards.

name: Kostantin, Baro of the Caravan
effect: Independent: Kostantin may steal equipment from another minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

name: Leandro
effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) If Leandro is ready during any Methuselah's untap phase (except yours), that Methuselah chooses either to burn 1 pool or to lose all transfers during his or her next influence phase. +2 bleed.

name: Legacy of Power
effect: Requires ready Prince, Justicar, or Inner Circle Member. Only usable when a vampire you control enters combat. A second vampire you control may play this card to end combat. Tap the second vampire. Combat ends. Both vampires engaged in combat go into torpor.

name: Legendary Vampire
effect: Unique Master. Put this card on a vampire with a capacity above 6 who was moved into your ready region during your last influence phase. This vampire gets +2 bleed and an additional 2 votes. Any vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

name: Leonardo, Mortician
effect: Unique mortal with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Leonardo may move 1 blood from the blood bank to any ready vampire as a +1 stealth action.

name: London Evening Star, Tabloid Newspaper
effect: Master: unique location. Tap to give any minion +1 intercept for the current action.

name: Madness of the Bard
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. All players in the game must speak in rhyming sentences. If a player speaks without rhyming, he or she burns 1 pool. Any minion may burn this card as a (D) action.

name: Magdelena Schaefer
effect: Camarilla: If Magdelena uses a strike that requires Thaumaturgy, she burns an additional blood.

name: Malkavian Derangement: Alternate Personality
effect: Master. Choose a ready Malkavian. Put this card on the vampire. Each time the Malkavian takes an action, his or her controller flips a coin. If the result is heads, continue with the action. If the result is tails, the action fails: his or her controller burns 1 pool and taps the Malkavian.

name: Morgue Hunting Ground
effect: Master: unique location. During your untap phase, a ready vampire you control gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can gain only 1 blood from Hunting Ground cards each turn.

name: Natalia
effect: Independent: +1 bleed.

name: Necromancy
effect: Master: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire has Necromancy; if the vampire already had Necromancy, he or she now has superior Necromancy. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be played on a vampire with superior Necromancy.

name: Nikolaus Vermeulen
effect: Camarilla Prince of Brussels: During your untap phase, you may move 1 blood from Nikolaus to any Nosferatu in your Uncontrolled region.

name: Nosferatu Hosting
effect: Master. You may use a master phase action to look at one vampire in another Methuselah's uncontrolled region. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Toreador as a (D) action.

name: Nosferatu Performance Art
effect: (D) Send any one Toreador into torpor or burn a location that requires a Toreador. If the Nosferatu performing this action has a capacity above 5, this action is at +1 stealth.

name: Of Noble Blood
effect: Requires a ready Primogen. +1 stealth action. Choose a Camarilla vampire with a capacity above 5 who does not have a title. Put this card on that vampire. The vampire is now a Primogen. Burn this card if this vampire loses this title. Not usable on Caitiff.

name: Order of Hermes Cabal
effect: Unique mage with 2 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed. Cabal may strike for 1R aggravated damage. Cabal may enter combat with any Tremere controlled by another Methuselah as a (D) action.

name: Oxford University, England
effect: Master: unique location. Tap and burn 2X pool to get X votes during a political action. This location may be burned by any minion as a (D) action; Ventrue get +1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: Palatial Estate
effect: This equipment card represents a unique location and does not count as equipment while in play. The vampire with this location gains 1 blood at the beginning of each of your master phases (ignore excess blood).

name: Park Hunting Ground
effect: Master: unique location. During your untap phase, a ready vampire you control gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can gain only 1 blood from Hunting Ground cards each turn.

name: Pentex Subversion
effect: Unique Master. Put this card on any ready minion. The minion with this card may not perform any actions and cannot block actions. This card may be burned by any other minion as a (D) action.

name: Pere Lachaise, France
effect:
Master: unique location.
You may place one of your burned vampires on this card. You may use a master phase action to move 1 blood from the blood bank to this vampire. If the blood on the vampire equals the vampire's capacity, place the vampire in the region at the end of the master phase and burn this card. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action and send the vampire on it directly to the ash heap.

name: Playing for Keeps
effect: Unique Master. Only usable if playing for ante. The cost of this card (X) represents the number of Methuselahs currently in the game. When a Methuselah's prey is ousted, the surviving Methuselah wins his or her prey's ante and antes an additional card.

name: Possession
effect: [nec] Move any vampire from your ash heap to your uncontrolled region. [NEC] Move a vampire from your ash heap to your ready region and move 1 blood from the blood bank to the vampire.

name: Powerbase: Berlin
effect: Master: unique location. You may use a master phase action to move 1 blood from the blood bank to the Powerbase. Any Ventrue you control may move 1 blood to the 'base as a +1 stealth action. Tap and burn X blood from the 'base to give a Ventrue +X intercept against a political action. The 'base can be stolen with a successful referendum called at +1 stealth. If controlling Methuselah has no Ventrue in play, burn this card.

name: Powerbase: Rome
effect:
Master: unique location.
You may use a master phase action to move 1 counter the blood bank to the Powerbase. Any Giovanni you control may move up to 2 of his or her blood counters to this card as a +1 stealth action. Tap and burn X counters from this card to gain X votes during a political action. Any minion may burn all counters on this card as a (D) action.

effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Camarilla vampire at +1 stealth. Successful referendum means the acting vampire is declared Prince of Amsterdam. This could lead to a contested title.

effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Camarilla vampire at +1 stealth. Successful referendum means the acting vampire is declared Prince of London. This could lead to a contested title.

effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Camarilla vampire at +1 stealth. Successful referendum means the acting vampire is declared Prince of Rome. This could lead to a contested title. If the Prince is Brujah, his or her capacity increases by 1.

effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Camarilla vampire at +1 stealth. Successful referendum means the acting vampire is declared Prince of Stockholm. This could lead to a contested title. If the Prince is Malkavian, his or her capacity increases by 1.

effect: +1 stealth action. [aus] This acting minion may untap a younger vampire or an ally. [AUS] As above, but the affected vampire can be the same age or older.

name: Ravnos Cache
effect: Master: unique location. During your master phase, you may move 1 counter from your pool to this card and add 1 blood from the blood bank. When equipping a minion, you may tap this card to use the blood counters on it to pay some or all of the -pool or blood- cost of the equipment.

name: Rebekka, Chantry Elder of Munich

effect: This equipment card represents a unique location and does not count as equipment while in play. Allies cannot block the vampire with this location.

name: Shackles of Enkidu
effect: Unique equipment. Before range is chosen in a round of combat, you may put the Shackles on any minion opposing the vampire with this card; this vampire still controls this card, however. effect: Camarilla: Sigrid gets +1 bleed -when bleeding a Methuselah who controls a ready Nosferatu-.

effect: This card can be played as an action modifier card or a reaction card. [nec] +1 stealth. [NEC] +1 intercept.

effect: [nec] Strike: dodge. [NEC] Strike: combat ends.

effect: Unique retainer with 1 life. Spiritual Protector is immune to damage that is not aggravated. Minions blocking or blocked by the minion with this retainer cannot use equipment in the resulting combat.

name: Stanislava
effect: Camarilla Inner Circle: (4 votes) Retainers employed by a minion opposing Stanislava lose their abilities until the end of combat; allies cannot block Stanislava. +2 bleed.

name: Stefano Giovanni
effect: Independent: During a political action, Stefano may burn 1 blood to gain 1 vote.

name: Strained Vitae Supply
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Vampires do not get the normal +1 stealth when hunting. Any Methuselah may use a master phase action to put 1 blood counter on this card from his or her pool. If the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the number of Methuselahs in the game, burn this card.

name: Tara, The Hollow One (Mage)
effect: Unique mage with 2 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. Tara may strike for 1R damage. Tara may burn any equipment card controlled by a Ravnos as a (D) action. The Ravnos gains blood equal to the cost of the equipment card. (Ignore excess blood.) If the equipment card has no cost, then the Ravnos gains 1 blood.

name: Tereza Rostas
effect: Independent: Tereza may attempt to get the Edge from another Methuselah as a (D) action that costs two blood.

name: The Hunt Club
effect: Unique Master. Put this card on any ready vampire. This vampire gets +1 stealth when attempting to commit diablerie. If a Blood Hunt is called against this vampire, he or she may not cast votes during the Blood Hunt.

name: The Louvre, Paris
effect:
Master: unique location.
You may tap this card to tap any Toreador. If you control the Prince of Paris, you may tap this card to tap any minion in play. Any minion can steal this location for his or her controller as a (D) action.

name: The Malkavian Seven Miseries
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Any minion attempting a political action gets -1 stealth. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Tremere as a (D) action.

name: The Mausoleum, Venice
effect: Master: unique location. Tap to gain 2 votes during a political action; if Ventrue Headquarters is in play, you gain only 1 vote.

name: The Treatment
effect: Master. Choose a Prince who has successfully bled you since your last turn. Put this card on that Prince. Each time that Prince untaps, he or she takes 1 point of damage (damage not preventable); the Prince may take a (D) action to burn this card.

name: The Trick of the Danya
effect: +1 stealth action. [chi] Move 1 blood from a vampire in your prey's uncontrolled region to your pool or to a vampire in your uncontrolled region. Alternate card name: Trick of Danya, The

name: Thoughts Betrayed
effect: [dom] Only usable before range is determined on the first round. Opposing minion takes an additional 1 damage in the first round of combat during strike resolution. [DOM] Only usable before range is determined on the first round. Opposing minion cannot play any strike cards for the duration of this combat.

name: Toreador Grand Ball
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Choose two ready Toreador you control. The first Toreador cannot be blocked unless he or she attempts to bleed. The second Toreador does not untap as normal during the untap phase; tap the second Toreador. This card may be burned by any minion as a (D) action; Nosferatu get -1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: Torment the Soul
effect: [nec] Strike: 1R damage; not usable on the first round of combat. [NEC] Strike: 1R damage, aggravated; not usable on the first round of combat.

name: Tradition Upheld
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Prince, Justicar, or Inner Circle member at +1 stealth. Choose a ready Caitiff. If this referendum is successful, burn that Caitiff.

name: Tremere Convocation
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Tremere get +1 stealth when attempting actions that require Thaumaturgy. During combat, vampires with basic Thaumaturgy may use Thaumaturgy combat cards at the superior level. This card may be burned as a (D) action; Malkavians get -1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: Triole's Revenge
effect: +1 stealth action. (D) Put this card on a Ventrue who is not at full capacity. A Ventrue suffering Triole's Revenge hunts each turn. If the Ventrue hunts while at full capacity, he or she is burned. Any Ventrue can take an action to burn this card.

name: Tsigane
effect: Independent

name: Vaclav Petalengro
effect: Independent: Vaclav gets +1 intercept when attempting to block Gangrel.

name: Veiled Sight
effect: Only usable by a reacting minion who attempts to block the acting minion. [chi] The acting minion's stealth is set to to 0. After this card is played, the acting minion may still increase his or her stealth. [CHI] As above, and this reacting vampire may steal 1 blood from the acting minion as a strike once during combat if combat begins.

name: Ventrue Directorate Assembly
effect: Master. Put this card in play. Each ready Ventrue gets an additional vote during political actions. This card may be burned by any minion as a (D) action; Brujah get +1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: Vial of Elder Vitae
effect: If a vampire is equipped with this Vial, you may burn this card to give the vampire any one Discipline until the beginning of your next untap phase. If the vampire has that Discipline, he or she gets the superior level of that Discipline. You cannot choose a Discipline the vampire already has at the superior level.

name: Vial of Garou Blood
effect: Equipment. A vampire with this Vial may burn this card before range is chosen in a round of combat. If he or she does do, he or she gets +1 strength and an additional strike each round for the remainder of combat, and he or she cannot use other equipment cards for the remainder of combat.

name: Victoria
effect: Camarilla: During your master phase, you may burn the Edge to gain 2 pool if Victoria is ready.

name: Vittorio Giovanni
effect: Independent

name: Volker, The Puppet Prince
effect: Camarilla Prince of Frankfurt: Volker cannot attempt to block Primogen.

name: Wasserschloss Anif, Austria
effect: Master: unique location. During your master phase, you may move 1 blood from any Tremere you control to this card. During your influence phase, you may tap this card to move all counters on this card to a Tremere in your uncontrolled region. This card may be burned by any minion as a (D) action; Malkavians get +1 stealth when attempting that action. If this card is burned, all of the blood on it is lost.

name: Werewolf Pack
effect: Unique werewolf with 3 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed. Werewolf Pack is not affected by damage from melee weapons.

name: Whispers of the Nictuku
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Every Nosferatu burns 1 additional blood to untap during his or her controller's untap phase. Any Methuselah can burn this card by burning 1 pool and spending four transfers during his or her influence phase.

name: Wilhelm Waldburg
effect: Camarilla Prince of Berlin: If Wilhelm's title is contested, the contesting vampire burns 1 additional blood each untap phase he or she does not yield.

name: Wrath of the Inner Circle
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any Inner Circle member at +1 stealth. Choose a ready Justicar. If the referendum is successful, put this card on that Justicar. The Justicar loses his or her title, and his or her capacity decreases by 1. (A vampire's capacity cannot go below 1.)

name: Zoe
effect: Camarilla: Zoe does not get the usual +1 stealth when hunting.

name: Zombie
effect: Zombie with 2 life. When the minion with this retainer is in combat, the opposing minion takes 1 additional damage during strike resolution if range is close. As a +1 stealth action, the vampire with this retainer may burn the Zombie to gain 2 blood.
